amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the appropriation for special education state grants by $300 million and reduce by the same amount funds for 21st Century Community Learning Centers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 186 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the bill's appropriation for special education state grants by $300 million via offsetting reductions of the same amount for the 21st Century Community Learning Centers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan (WI) amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 124 - 293 (Roll no. 260).
